name: Thomas and Jericho
description:
[TW: BLOOD]

Oh noes! You are Jericho, running away from your arch-nemesis, Thomas. Press Space to jump over all the unsuspicious obstacles. As always, Left and Right arrow to go through your killer playlist!

Songs used:

BFB Division - Mick Gordon

Chase - batta

Giving Bad People Good Ideas - Death Grips

リサフランク420 / 現代のコンピュー - MACINTOSH PLUS
